1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

## 💻 버그 발생 환경
- Device: [e.g. Desktop, iPhone6]
- OS: [e.g. Windows10, iOS8.1]
- Browser [e.g. chrome, stock browser, safari]
- Version [e.g. 22]
